meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ruth Anne Stevens-Klitz Les Taub Roger Craig Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #5979.

td.p: Ruth Anne Stevens-Klitz, a foreign service officer originally from Middleburg Heights, Ohio
Les Taub, a training and sportsmanship consultant from New York, New York
Roger Craig, a graduate student of computer science from Newark, Delaware (whose 3-day cash winnings total $138,401)

tr.td: THE 23rd PSALM
(Alex: This is according to the King James Bible.)
GOOD SPORTSMANSHIP
SILENCE
PUSH BY SAFIRE
(Jimmy: Out of wreckage in New Orleans, bringing a new & greener neighborhood to life.)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The Lord is my shepherd

Ruth Anne
')
